parent.description: Id of the parent of the orb

path.description: Show/hide the curve traced by the orb

stick.description: Show/hide the stick from the parent to the orb

wheel.description: Show/hide the wheel from the parent to the orb

from.description: Cycle to trace the curve from

to.description: Cycle to trace the curve to

step.description: Number of points plotted per cycle

radius.description: Radius at which the orb orbits around its parent

spin.description: How many full orbits the orb makes around its parent in 360 cycles

offset.description: The angle of the orb from its parent at the 0th cycle

dashArray.description: List of dash and gap lengths along the curve

dashOffset.description: Offset of the dash array along the curve

lineCap.description: Shape of the stroke's end points

close.description: Whether to close the end of the curve back to the start, or leave it open
